select student_no as stuNo, student_name as stuName,
concat(substr(student_ssn,1,8),'******') as stuSsn,
concat(substr(student_address,1,10),'...') as stuAddress,
DATE_FORMAT(entrance_date,'%Y/%m/%d') as entDate, absence_yn as absYn from tb_student

select student_no as stuNo, student_name as stuName,
concat(substr(student_ssn,1,8),'******') as stuSsn,
IF(student_address is null, '***주소 미상***', concat(substr(student_address,1,10),'...')) as stuAddress,
DATE_FORMAT(entrance_date,'%Y/%m/%d') as entDate, absence_yn as absYn from tb_student where student_name LIKE concat('%',#{student_name},'%')

select student_no as stuNo, student_name as stuName,
concat(substr(student_ssn,1,8),'******') as stuSsn,

where substr(entrance_date,1,4) between #{StartYear} and #{EndYear} order by entrance_date desc
